item.title: Find the Index of the First Occurrence in a String
item.description: Given 2 strings - haystack and needle. Problem statement Find the index of needle substring if present in haystack and return starting index of the first occurrence, else return -1. Intuition: Use Window Sliding technique Idea is to iterate from 0 till length of haystack - length of needle, this will help us not to overrun the last index. Algorithm function find_occurence{ loop i: 0 to haystack.length-needle.length{ haystack.substring(i, i+needle.length) == needle return index } return -1 } Example: haystack: hadel, needle: ade

item.title: Palindrome Number
item.description: Given - number n. Return - n is palindrome or not. Steps Create a temporary variable to store the incoming number for later. Create a variable to store the reconstructed reverse of the given number and initialize it to 0. We take the idea of dividing (%) a number by 10 that gives the units digit as remainder. (Main step to remember while answering problems like this) So, we keep a condition in while loop that number must not be 0.
